title: The Silent Reset
outcome: A Council-backed Innovator group releases a hidden BCI reset, wiping all resident scores and data. City functions lock down, creating panic. Citizens form new rules and barter systems, as the Directorate faction calls for emergency rule. The crisis pushes Stenograd to the edge between new freedom and renewed control.

events.description: A secretive Innovator group, fearing total loss of control, uploads a BCI reset patch, instantly erasing all active citizen records and scores.
Citywide confusion ensues as housing, transit, and identification systems fail overnight. Residents are locked out; streets fill with makeshift resource exchanges.
Neighborhoods organize impromptu barter hubs and mutual aid circles. Council security loyalists attempt to restore order but face mass noncompliance.
The Directorate faction demands emergency powers and the return of strict BCI control. Teachers and citizen councils resist, proposing decentralized alternatives.

After weeks of upheaval, many districts thrive under self-organized systems, while others descend into disorder. Stenograd stands divided between those embracing new-found freedom and those calling for BCI restoration.
